DatasheetAbilities.Name: My Will be Done
DatasheetAbilities.Description: One per battle round, one unit from your army with this ability can be targeted with a Stratagem for 0CP, even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

DatasheetAbilities.Name: Implacable Resilience
DatasheetAbilities.Description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from that attack's Damage characteristic.

WargearAbilities.Name: Resurrection Orb
WargearAbilities.Description: While the bearer is leading a unit, that unit's Reanimation Protocols activate at the end of your opponent's Command phase in addition to at the end of yours.

DatasheetAbilities.Name: Implacable Eradication
DatasheetAbilities.Description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If the target of that attack is an enemy unit in range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

DatasheetAbilities.Name: Rite of Reanimation
DatasheetAbilities.Description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

DatasheetAbilities.Name: Technomancer
DatasheetAbilities.Description: At the end of your Movement phase, you can select one friendly Necron model within 3'' of the bearer. That model regains up to D3 lost wounds. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per turn.

WargearAbilities.Name: Canoptek Cloak
WargearAbilities.Description: The bearer has the Fly keyword, the Lone Operative ability and a Move characteristic of 10''

WargearAbilities.Name: Canoptek control Node (Aura)
WargearAbilities.Description: While a friendly Canoptek unit is within 6'' of the bearer, each time a Canoptek model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the hit roll
